description: This source file defines debug helper utilities for Note objects, providing methods to generate concise summaries and detailed troubleshooting information.

classes.name: NoteDebug
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to assist with debugging Note objects, including summarization and detailed diagnostics.

methods.name: summarize
methods.description: Returns a concise single-line string summarizing key properties of a Note, suitable for quick diagnostics.

methods.name: detail
methods.description: Provides detailed multi-line information about a Note object for troubleshooting purposes.
